name: Cosme-Phytamis® Guarana
description: Cosme-Phytamis® Guarana by Alban Muller is comprised of Paullinia Cupana Seed Extract, Water, Glycerin, Glycerol and Guarana, ext. Extractives and their physically modified derivatives such as tinctures, concretes, absolutes, essential oils, oleoresins, terpenes, terpene-free fractions, distillates, residues, etc., obtained from Paullinia cupana, Sapindaceae.. It is commonly used It is a Organic and Preservative-free Key benefits in use include: Astringency and Slimming. Cosme-Phytamis® Guarana is certified as ECOCERT. It is available in Liquid form.
